mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveScheduleInformationList */ A."year" AS "scheduleYear" , G.CLS_ID AS "classID" , G.CLS_NM AS "className" , G.C_YEAR AS "classYear" , G.SEMESTER AS "semester" , G.GENR AS "generation" , G.DEPT_ID AS "departmentID" , H.DEPT_NM AS "departmentName" , B.SCH_ID AS "scheduleID" , B."day" AS "scheduleDay" , B.SEQNO AS "seqNo" , B.TCH_ID AS "teacherID" , D.FRST_NM AS "firstName" , D.LAST_NM AS "lastName" , D.GENDER AS "gender" , D.PHONE AS "phoneNumber" , D.EMAIL AS "email" , B.SUB_ID AS "subjectID" , E.SUB_NM AS "subjectName" , B.RM_ID AS "roomID" , F.RM_NM AS "roomName" , F.BUILDING AS "building" , F.FLOOR AS "floor" , B.STA_TIME AS "startTime" , B.END_TIME AS "endTime" FROM FRST.SCHED_INFO A JOIN FRST.SCHED_DETAIL B ON A.SCH_ID = B.SCH_ID LEFT JOIN FRST.CLS_INFOV1 C ON A.CLS_INFO_ID = C.CLS_INFO_ID AND C.STCD <> '02' LEFT JOIN FRST.USER_INFO D ON B.TCH_ID = D.SPEC_ID AND D.STCD <> '02' LEFT JOIN FRST.SUBJ_INFO E ON B.SUB_ID = E.SUB_ID AND E.STCD <> '02' LEFT JOIN FRST.RM_INFO F ON B.RM_ID = F.RM_ID AND F.STCD <> '02' LEFT JOIN FRST.CLS_INFOV1 G ON A.CLS_INFO_ID = G.CLS_INFO_ID AND G.STCD <> '02' LEFT JOIN FRST.DEPT_INFO H ON G.DEPT_ID = H.DEPT_ID AND H.STCD <> '02' WHERE ('' = #{scheduleDay} OR LOWER(B."day") = #{scheduleDay}) AND ('' = #{departmentID} OR H.DEPT_ID = #{departmentID}) AND ('' = #{teacherID} OR B.TCH_ID = #{teacherID}) AND ('' = #{subjectID} OR B.SUB_ID = #{subjectID}) AND ('' = #{roomID} OR B.RM_ID = #{roomID}) AND ('' = #{floor} OR F.FLOOR = #{floor}) AND ('' = #{classYear} OR G.C_YEAR = #{classYear}) AND ('' = #{semester} OR G.SEMESTER = #{semester}) ORDER BY A."year" DESC , G.C_YEAR DESC , G.SEMESTER DESC , B.SEQNO

SELECT /* retrieveSubjectInformationListForDownload */ A.CLS_ID AS "classID" , B.CLS_NM AS "className" , A.SUB_ID AS "SUB_ID" , A.SUB_NM AS "subjectName" , A.SUB_DESC AS "subjectDesc" , A.STCD AS "statusCode" , A.FRST_REG_DT AS "firstRegisterDate" , A.FRST_REG_TIME AS "firstRegisterTime" , A.LAST_CHNG_DT AS "lastChangeDate" , A.LAST_CHNG_TIME AS "lastChangeTime" FROM FRST.SUBJ_INFO A JOIN FRST.CLS_INFO B ON A.CLS_ID = B.CLS_ID WHERE ('' = COALESCE(#{classID}, '') OR A.CLS_ID = #{classID}) AND (A.SUB_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%' OR A.SUB_DESC ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{searchKey}, '') || '%') AND A.STCD <> '02' AND B.STCD <> '02' ORDER BY A.CLS_ID , A.SUB_ID

SELECT /* RetrieveSubjectIsExist */ CLS_ID AS "classID" , SUB_ID AS "subjectID" , SUB_NM AS "subjectName" , SUB_DESC AS "subjectDesc" , STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.SUBJ_INFO WHERE CLS_ID = #{classID} AND ('' = COALESCE(#{subjectID}, '') OR SUB_ID = #{subjectID}) LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterSubjectInformation */ INTO FRST.SUBJ_INFO ( CLS_ID , SUB_ID , SUB_NM , SUB_DESC , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{classID} , #{subjectID} , COALESCE(#{subjectName}, '') , COALESCE(#{subjectDesc}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateSubjectInformation */ FRST.SUBJ_INFO SET SUB_NM = COALESCE(#{subjectName}, SUB_NM) , SUB_DESC = COALESCE(#{subjectDesc}, SUB_DESC) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) , LAST_CHNG_DT = COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, LAST_CHNG_DT) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE CLS_ID = #{classID} AND SUB_ID = #{subjectID}
